name: Jerry Jeff Walker
description: '''Jerry Jeff Walker''' (born '''Ronald Clyde Crosby'''; March 16, 1942 â€“ October 23, 2020) was an American [[country music|country]] and [[folk music|folk]] singer-songwriter. He was a leading figure in the [[progressive country]] and  [[outlaw country]] music movement. He also wrote the 1968 song "[[Mr. Bojangles (song)|Mr. Bojangles]]".
